nodes.text: The Trax Tube was a hyperlane that crossed the Trax sector, which was located in the Mid Rim. The planet Deysum III was located on this run.

During the Galactic Civil War, Redda Macrebe, a Rebel Alliance "procurement specialist," preyed upon Imperial ships along this route. He was aided by Mister Tisilan, an art thief, and droid merchant Vo Lantes.
